lead_paragraph: It took the Tigers 12 successive losing seasons, one of them with a 43-119 record, to wake up to reality. If they were ever going to compete again, they would have to spend some money. Ever since General Manager Dave Dombrowski was given the authority to do that, he has done a championship-caliber job.
